DOC.brief_title: Treatment Spastic Equinovarus Foot After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multicentric open trial evaluate efficacy combine treatment spastic foot stroke use ankle foot orthosis without selective injection BTA ( Botox ) tibialis anterior and/or posterior and/or long toe flexor , and/or medial lateral gastrocnemius , and/or soleus muscle [ 300 BTA U per injection ( Botox - Allergan ) , dilute saline concentration 5U/0,1 mL , electromyography guide injection ] . The patient follow one year treatment .
DOC.criteria: Stroke patient equinovarus foot due severe low limb extensor spasticity impaired foot contact walk Ability walk least 10 meter without aid Stroke interval < 12 month Age > 18 year old Weight > 30 kg < 100 kg Written inform consent Stroke interval > 12 month Age < 18 year old Pregnancy Neuromuscular disease Previous treatment BTA Fixed contractures impair mobility MiniMental Status Examination < 25 Aminosides treatment .
